contexts.context: ...are cared for by the state committee, different <mark>institutions</mark>, and associations like the “Kulka Ralnitsche” and others...
...had to be called to lead them to welfare <mark>institutions</mark>. In one day alone, over 1,500 beggars...
...would become something turned into something needed: an <mark>institution</mark> constituting a fear of God in our children....
